task.title: Cleanup - Front-End Staff
task.shortdesc: This is the cleaning procedure front-end staff should follow as part of the closing procedure.

context.p: All cleanup items should be completed as part of the closing procedure. See "Closing Procedure" for more information.

step.cmd: Clean all tables and the main counter with a wash cloth and Natural A solution.
step.info: Use Windex instead of Natural A when wiping off the glass of the main counter.

step.cmd: Set each table according to the table plan.

substep.cmd: Arrange all chairs and stools in their assigned locations.
Ensure each table is outfitted with the proper accessories. Tables should have the seasonal decoration and have four menus each.
Refill all napkin holders to full.

step.cmd: Mop the floor of the front-end area.

substep.cmd: Special attention should be given to the entryways, where dirt or snow may have been tracked in. The welcome mats should be shaken out as part of this procedure.

step.cmd: Once the rest of the front has been cleaned, clear the chalkboard and write on it the information for the next day's specials.
